Service Details: - Provides employment assistance for individuals 18 years or older who would like to get ready for college, improve math, reading or study skills- Provides training at each person's level to help them get back to work or continue with school- Participants will receive educational assessment and individualized training plan, career and educational planning (including trades), improve math and literacy skills, basic computer training, workplace communication, short term certificate training such as Food Safe and First Aid, and work search training
Hours: Mon-Fri: 8:30am - 4:30pm (closed 12pm - 1pm) training hours vary, please call or email for schedule
Eligibility: Ages: 18 year(s) and upMust be:- A resident of BC- 18 years or older- Unemployed / not on EI (have not had an EI claim within the last 3 years, or a maternity / parental claim in the last 5 years)- Not a student
